original_text: Feel Atom’s glory! Your flesh will blister, heretic!

Burn bright in the name of Atom, unclean wretch!
You will bathe in holy fire, heretic! Die screaming!
Atom demands sacrifice—and today, it’s you!
The ruins know your name. So do I.
The voices told me you'd be here.
Wrong place, wrong time, asshole!
Shoot first, loot later—let's go!
Let's gut this fucker and move on!
